siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client.zookeeper

Interface ZKMonitorCallback


  • public interface ZKMonitorCallback
    It represents a client's callback. It should be implemented by clients that wants to receive notifications when zookeeper quorum or zookeeper node status has changed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onGetQuorum()
      It is the handler method called when zookeeper cluster detects that quorum has been formed
      void onLackOfQuorum()
      It is the handler method called when zookeeper cluster detects that there are not nodes enough to form quorum
      void onNodeDown(java.lang.String zkNodeName)
      It is a handler method called when a zookeeper node goes down
      void onNodeUp(java.lang.String zkNodeName)
      It is a handler method called when a zookeeper node comes up

    • Method Detail

      • onNodeUp

        void onNodeUp(java.lang.String zkNodeName)
        It is a handler method called when a zookeeper node comes up
        Parameters:
        zkNodeName - the zookeeper node name

      • onNodeDown

        void onNodeDown(java.lang.String zkNodeName)
        It is a handler method called when a zookeeper node goes down
        Parameters:
        zkNodeName - the zookeeper node name

      • onGetQuorum

        void onGetQuorum()
        It is the handler method called when zookeeper cluster detects that quorum has been formed

      • onLackOfQuorum

        void onLackOfQuorum()
        It is the handler method called when zookeeper cluster detects that there are not nodes enough to form quorum
